ygData.subject: Mana Song, some data
ygData.msgSnippet: Got a chance to run a couple tests with my level 31 enchanter friend (my bard s 35th) Times are just for one bubble of mana.... Clarity Alone : 72 seconds
ygData.messageBody:
Got a chance to run a couple tests with my level 31 enchanter friend (my
bard's 35th)

Times are just for one bubble of mana....

Clarity Alone : 72 seconds
ManaSong Constant: 65 seconds
ManaSong Juggled: 65 seconds
Clarity+Song : 48 seconds

Couldn't find another bard around to test if the song stacks with itself,
that's still left to be decided but at least we're sure now that clarity &
the song do stack. And the song is just like most other bard songs in that
it has a 3 round effect, and can be juggled with two other songs w/ no drop
in regen rate.


Fendryl Istalindir, HalfElven Minstrel of Tarew Marr
